text: Tomaloke sihamtaka (tolaniya putraka) sihamtara pitrra paraicayerae matiba; allahara ocarata e'itorae'i bechi n'yayasangata. Eteke yadi tomaloke sihamtara pitrra paraicaya najana tente sihamta tomalokara dbini bha'i arau bandhu. E'i bisaye tomaloke kono anicchakrta bhula karaile tomalokara kono dosa nahaya; kintu tomalokara antarae yito icchakrtabharae karaiche (seya aparaadha); arau allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu
